instruction.value: Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of LEFT eye for 2 days.
Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of LEFT eye for next 5 days.
Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of RIGHT eye for 2 days.
Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of RIGHT eye for next 5 days.
Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of affected eye(s) for 2 days.
Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of affected eye(s) for next 5 days.
Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of BOTH eyes for 2 days.
Apply 1/2 inch ribbon of ointment into the conjuctival sac of BOTH eyes for next 5 days.
